query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employees (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  fullName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  phone VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  username VARCHAR(100),
  employeeRole ENUM('platform_owner', 'platform_admin', 'org_owner', 'org_admin', 'manager', 'supervisor', 'operator', 'technician', 'collector', 'warehouse_manager', 'warehouse_worker', 'accountant', 'investor') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'operator',
  employeeStatus ENUM('active', 'inactive', 'on_leave', 'terminated') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  telegramUserId VARCHAR(100),
  telegramUsername VARCHAR(100),
  hireDate DATETIME,
  salary DECIMAL(15,2),
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  telegramUserId VARCHAR(100),
  telegramUsername VARCHAR(100),
  hireDate DATETIME,
  salary DECIMAL(15,2),
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
